backgroundInformationList.description: Declaration of Surplus Property - 1, 7 & 15 Sudbury Hall Drive

noticeDescription:
NOTICE is hereby given that in accordance with the City of Toronto’s real estate disposal By-law, on March 14, 2024 the public highway abutting 1, 7 & 15 Sudbury Hall Drive, legally described as 3Part Lot 13 Block F Pl 279  designated as Parts 1 and 2 on Plan 66R-3354, City of Toronto, being Part of PIN 06193-0761 (LT): and Road Allowance Between Lots 6 & 7 Concession 2, Scarborough  Toronto, City of Toronto, designated as Part 3 on Plan 66R-33354, being PIN 06193-0929 (LT), was declared surplus conditional on City Council approving the permanent closure of the highway and subject to the reservation of an easement for storm and sanitary sewer.

 

The property has a total area of approximately 179.3 m2 (1,930 ft2).  The City proposes that the intended manner of disposal is to be by way of inviting an offer to purchase from 1020969 Ontario Limited and Bonnydon.

 

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Ms. Winnie Lam, Property Office, Tel: 437-991-8040, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until April 5, 2024.
title: Declaration of Surplus Property - 1, 7 & 15 Sudbury Hall Drive
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
